parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the Kapp to find submissions in.

parameter.label: Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the Form to find submissions in. If none provided, can only use Kapp Fields in search query

parameter.label: Form Type
parameter.tooltip: The Type of Form to find submissions in.

parameter.label: Core State
parameter.tooltip: Searches for submissions that have a core state that matches this parameter. If no value is provided, the results will contain submissions in all core states.

parameter.label: Limit
parameter.tooltip: Limit the number of results returned. If not provided, the server will limit the results to 25 submissions. Maximum limit 1000

parameter.label: Query
parameter.tooltip: Query to use to fetch submissions. (i.e values[First Name]="Fred")

parameter.label: Timeline
parameter.tooltip: Date property to search by. The default value is createdAt.

parameter.label: Direction
parameter.tooltip: Result Set sorting direction. The default value is descending.

parameter.label: Start Date/Time
parameter.tooltip: Start date/time of the timeline. This value should be used to both refine and limit the search results. Format should be yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'

parameter.label: End Date/Time
parameter.tooltip: End date/time of the timeline. This value should be used to both refine and limit the search results. Formatshould be yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'

parameter.label: Next Page Token
parameter.tooltip: The value to use as the offset for the page of submissions to return. The submission that matches this value will not be included in the results.

result.name: Submissions List JSON
result.tooltip: JSON representation of the list of Submissions found

result.name: Next Page Token
result.tooltip: The value to use as the offset for the next page of submissions to return

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Method
parameter.tooltip: GET,POST,PUT,PATCH,DELETE (Defaults to GET)

parameter.label: Path
parameter.tooltip: Example: /kapps/:kappSlug/forms/:formSlug

parameters.parameter: /kapps/<%=@inputs['Kapp Slug']%><%=@inputs['Form Slug'].to_s.empty? ? '' : "/forms/#{@inputs['Form Slug']}"%>/submissions?include=details,origin,parent,values,children,form,form.kapp<%=@inputs['Core State'].to_s.empty? ? '' : "&coreState=#{ERB::Util.url_encode(@inputs['Core State'])}"%><%=@inputs['Limit'].to_s.empty? ? '' : "&limit=#{ERB::Util.url_encode(@inputs['Limit'])}"%><%=@inputs['Form Type'].to_s.empty? ? '' : "&type=#{ERB::Util.url_encode(@inputs['Form Type'])}"%><%=@inputs['Timeline'].to_s.empty? ? '' : "&timeline=#{ERB::Util.url_encode(@inputs['Timeline'])}"%><%=@inputs['Direction'].to_s.empty? ? '' : "&direction=#{ERB::Util.url_encode(@inputs['Direction'])}"%><%=@inputs['Start Date/Time'].to_s.empty? ? '' : "&start=#{ERB::Util.url_encode(@inputs['Start Date/Time'])}"%><%=@inputs['End Date/Time'].to_s.empty? ? '' : "&end=#{ERB::Util.url_encode(@inputs['End Date/Time'])}"%><%=@inputs['Next Page Token'].to_s.empty? ? '' : "&pageToken=#{ERB::Util.url_encode(@inputs['Next Page Token'])}"%><%=@inputs['Query'].to_s.empty? ? '' : "&q=#{ERB::Util.url_encode(@inputs['Query'])}"%>

parameter.label: Body
parameter.tooltip: JSON body if applicable (POST,PUT,PATCH)

parameter.label: Submissions List JSON
parameter.tooltip: JSON representation of the list of Submissions found

parameter.label: Next Page Token
parameter.tooltip: The value to use as the offset for the next page of submissions to return

parameter.label: Count
parameter.tooltip: Number of submissions Found

parameter.label: Error Message
parameter.tooltip: Error Message
